Review Name: Fabulous! Review Description: People generally looks for Diakin or Hitachi.. But this machine is exceptionally good.. Using 5in1 2021 model for the past 1 year and now this 2022 model.. One thing to mention if you guys are concerned about power consumption I would suggest that u to install an over size machine than actual requirement.. but if u r planning to buy non inverter machine never do so.. this only works with inverter machine
